name: BOYSEN®® Paint and Varnish Remover B‑141

info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Paint and Varnish Remover B‑141 is an economical wax-based paint stripper. It is used as a preparation chemical for the repainting of metal, wood, and masonry surfaces.

info.title: APPLICATION SCHEDULE
info.body: Apply BOYSEN®® Paint and Varnish Remover B‑141 onto painted surface using a brush. After approximately 10 minutes or when the existing paint has wrinkled, scrape off the old paint using a spatula or a putty knife. If the residue has become very difficult to remove, reapply BOYSEN®® Paint and Varnish Remover B‑141.
